original: @70b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @70b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: bhatt'a ka manydzu shr'i ya m'a ri p'u dza kra ma bidhi n'a ma /
analyzed: bhatt'a ka manydzu shr'i ya m'a ri p'u dza kra ma bidhi n'a ma /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

analyzed: rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba /

original: bla ma rje btsun dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bla ma rje btsun dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: shes rab snying rjer ldan zhing dad pa legs brtan dang // sangs rgyas snying po 'dod phyir gang zag dbang thob pas //
analyzed: shes rab snying rjer ldan zhing dad pa legs brtan dang // sangs rgyas snying po 'dod phyir gang zag dbang thob pas //

original: bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i rim pa khong du chud byas nas //
analyzed: bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i rim pa khong du chud byas nas //
translated: Having understood the stages of approach and accomplishment,

original: rje btsun rnams la btud de rgyud 'dis sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: rje btsun rnams la btud de rgyud 'dis sbyang bar bya //
translated: Should bow to the venerable ones and train in this Tantra.

original: bdag nyid dran pa gcig pa'i 'gro blor ldan //
analyzed: bdag nyid dran pa gcig pa'i 'gro blor ldan //
translated: The person who has the mind of the single recollection,

original: bdag med pa las bzlog cing 'byor pa gsum dag pas //
analyzed: bdag med pa las bzlog cing 'byor pa gsum dag pas //
translated: Who is turned away from selflessness, and who is pure in the three excellences,

original: bsnyen dang sgrub la rab tu mkhas byas te //
analyzed: bsnyen dang sgrub la rab tu mkhas byas te //
translated: Having become very skilled in the approach and accomplishment,

original: nyin dang mtshan mo thams cad g-yeng med tshul gyis 'bad //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan mo thams cad g-yeng med tshul gyis 'bad //

original: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo rdo rje can bcas dang // dri med snying po mthar mdzad bla ma rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo rdo rje can bcas dang // dri med snying po mthar mdzad bla ma rdo rje 'dzin //

original: dgra las rgyal ba gshin rje gshed nag lha yi tshogs //
analyzed: dgra las rgyal ba gshin rje gshed nag lha yi tshogs //
translated: The assembly of deities of black Yamantaka, the conqueror of enemies,

original: thugs rjes thugs chud spyan ras nyid 'tsho dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: thugs rjes thugs chud spyan ras nyid 'tsho dgongs su gsol //
translated: Please consider me with compassion, O Avalokiteshvara.

original: chos sku longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul sku'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: chos sku longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul sku'i rang bzhin can //
translated: Having the nature of dharmakaya, sambhogakaya, and nirmanakaya,

original: rgyal ba'i rang bzhin phung pos sems can re 'dod skong //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i rang bzhin phung pos sems can re 'dod skong //
translated: The nature of the Victorious Ones fulfills the hopes of each sentient being.üîΩThe supreme doctor who heals the sick with perfect wealth and abundance,

original: 'byor ldan phun sum tshogs pas nad gsos sman pa'i mchog / bla ma mgon po de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'byor ldan phun sum tshogs pas nad gsos sman pa'i mchog / bla ma mgon po de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: phung po lnga las rgyal zhing nyon mongs lnga rnams dag / rang gzhan don rdzogs gang zhig phag mo la sogs 'khril //

original: ye shes rigs mtshungs lnga ldan rin chen lnga yi mdog / rnam mthar pha rol @71a * //
analyzed: ye shes rigs mtshungs lnga ldan rin chen lnga yi mdog / rnam mthar pha rol @71a * //

original: phyin zhal phyag ldan khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: phyin zhal phyag ldan khyod la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you.

original: bdud bzhi las rgyal lta ba'i nges sgrol bcom nas kyang //
analyzed: bdud bzhi las rgyal lta ba'i nges sgrol bcom nas kyang //
translated: Having conquered the four mƒÅras, the view is liberated from theüîΩbhagavƒÅn, the one who has arisen from the signs of the wrathful ones,

original: dad sogs rnam dag khro bo'i rtags su nges 'byung ba //
analyzed: dad sogs rnam dag khro bo'i rtags su nges 'byung ba //
translated: such as faith, and so on,üîΩthe one who has abandoned all obscurations through the method of

original: thabs kyis phyag rgyas sgrib pa thams cad mthar spangs pa'i //
analyzed: thabs kyis phyag rgyas sgrib pa thams cad mthar spangs pa'i //
translated: mudrƒÅ,üîΩthe one with the signs of the weapons of the terrifying and wrathful

original: 'jigs shing rab gtum phyag mtshan rtags ldan phyag 'tshal bstod ;
analyzed: 'jigs shing rab gtum phyag mtshan rtags ldan phyag 'tshal bstod ;
translated: ones‚Äîhomage and praise!

original: / sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi ni rnam dag sku //
analyzed: / sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi ni rnam dag sku //
translated: The pure body of the four elements‚Äîearth, water, fire, and air‚Äî

original: byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms nyid //
analyzed: byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms nyid //
translated: love, compassion, joy, and equanimity,

original: thabs dang smon lam ye shes rdzogs mdzad pa //
analyzed: thabs dang smon lam ye shes rdzogs mdzad pa //
translated: the one who perfects method, aspiration, and pristine consciousness,

original: tsartsi phag mo goo r'i'i dbyangs ldan phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: tsartsi phag mo goo r'i'i dbyangs ldan phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: homage and praise to the one with the voice of Ca·πõcika and ·∏åombinƒ´!üîΩThe offerings of water for drinking, the supreme seat, washing the feet,

original: mchod yon gdan mchog zhabs bkru ldan pa dang // spos dang me tog mar me zhal zas tshogs //
analyzed: mchod yon gdan mchog zhabs bkru ldan pa dang // spos dang me tog mar me zhal zas tshogs //

analyzed: rol mo'i sil snyan me tog phreng dang lnga ldi dang // mchod sdong bye bas brgyan pas rab tu mchod par bgyi //

original: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya 'dod pa'i yon tan tshogs //
analyzed: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya 'dod pa'i yon tan tshogs //
translated: Forms, sounds, smells, tastes, and textures, the collection of desirable qualities,

original: du mar spyad kyang tshim pa med cing ngo mtshar ba //
analyzed: du mar spyad kyang tshim pa med cing ngo mtshar ba //
translated: Are enjoyed in many ways, but there is no satisfaction or wonder.

original: yid ldan sems kyis ngal bso khyad par gyur pa rnams //
analyzed: yid ldan sems kyis ngal bso khyad par gyur pa rnams //
translated: For those with minds, the mind rests, and there is a special transformation.

original: mos blo dad pa'i mthu yis bde gshegs 'khor lo mchod //
analyzed: mos blo dad pa'i mthu yis bde gshegs 'khor lo mchod //
translated: With the power of devoted interest and faith, they offer the Sugata's wheel.

original: 'khor lo rin chen rta dang glang po rab mtshan ldan //
analyzed: 'khor lo rin chen rta dang glang po rab mtshan ldan //
translated: The precious wheel, with the excellent marks of horses and elephants,

original: rgyal po btsun mo blon po mchog ni zhi zhing mdzes //
analyzed: rgyal po btsun mo blon po mchog ni zhi zhing mdzes //
translated: The king, queen, and supreme ministers are peaceful and beautiful.

original: 'byor ldan phun sum tshogs pa 'khor los sgyur ba yi //
analyzed: 'byor ldan phun sum tshogs pa 'khor los sgyur ba yi //
translated: Possessing wealth and perfect, the universal monarch

original: khyad par rdzas kyis bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod //
analyzed: khyad par rdzas kyis bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod //
translated: Offers the excellent wheel of the Sugata with special substances.

original: gdugs dang nyer ldan dung dang padmas rab tu mdzes //
analyzed: gdugs dang nyer ldan dung dang padmas rab tu mdzes //
translated: With parasols, conches, and lotuses, it is very beautiful.üîΩThe excellent ornaments of the wheel, banner, and svastika,

original: gundhe dpal be'u rgyal mtshan 'khor lo mdzes pa'i mchog /'jig rten dag na grags shing snyan par gang brjod pa'i //
analyzed: gundhe dpal be'u rgyal mtshan 'khor lo mdzes pa'i mchog /'jig rten dag na grags shing snyan par gang brjod pa'i //
translated: Whatever is renowned and praised in the world,

original: bla med rnams kyis bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod //
analyzed: bla med rnams kyis bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod //
translated: The unsurpassed ones offer the excellent wheel of the Sugata.

original: dri chen rdo rje chur ldan byang chub sems dkar dmar dang bcas ;
analyzed: dri chen rdo rje chur ldan byang chub sems dkar dmar dang bcas ;
translated: The great lamp, endowed with the vajra water of feces,üîΩthe white and red bodhicitta, and the meat of humans, horses, cows, elephants, and dogs,

original: / mi sha rta dang ba lang glang chen khyi sha dang // sgron ma che dang ldan pas dur khrod mdzes byas pas //
analyzed: / mi sha rta dang ba lang glang chen khyi sha dang // sgron ma che dang ldan pas dur khrod mdzes byas pas //
translated: adorns the charnel ground.

original: rnam par rtog bral bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod //
analyzed: rnam par rtog bral bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod //
translated: Free from conceptuality, I offer to the Sugata the supreme wheel.

original: bde gshegs khyed la ji snyed gnas pa'i yon tan ni //
analyzed: bde gshegs khyed la ji snyed gnas pa'i yon tan ni //
translated: The qualities that exist in you, Sugata,

original: bdag gis bskal pa'i mtha' bar brjod pas mi lang bas//
analyzed: bdag gis bskal pa'i mtha' bar brjod pas mi lang bas//
translated: cannot be expressed by me even in the course of an eon.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' tsam mos 'dis //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' tsam mos 'dis //
translated: With this space-like devotion to the ma·πá·∏çalas of your body, speech, and mind,

original: rgyal ba gcig bzhin sangs rgyas 'khor lo thams cad bstod //
analyzed: rgyal ba gcig bzhin sangs rgyas 'khor lo thams cad bstod //
translated: I praise all the wheels of the buddhas, as if they were one victorious one.üîΩThe ten nonvirtues that ripen at the door of body, speech, and mind,

original: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug mang gis bskyed cing //üîΩlus ngag yid gsum sgo ru smin pa'i mi dge bcu //üîΩso so thar dang byang chub sems dang rig pa @71b 'dzin ;
analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug mang gis bskyed cing // lus ngag yid gsum sgo ru smin pa'i mi dge bcu // so so thar dang byang chub sems dang rig pa @71b 'dzin ;
translated: generated by the many poisons of desire, hatred, and ignorance,üîΩand all the transgressions of the pratimok·π£a, bodhisattva, and vidyƒÅdhara

original: / tshul khrims sdom dang dam tshigs nyams pa ji snyed bshags //
analyzed: / tshul khrims sdom dang dam tshigs nyams pa ji snyed bshags //
translated: vows, samayas, and vows‚ÄîI confess them all.

original: bdag gis bgyis dang de bzhin bgyid du stsal //
analyzed: bdag gis bgyis dang de bzhin bgyid du stsal //
translated: And those that I have caused to be done.

original: nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i tshogs //
analyzed: nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i tshogs //
translated: The accumulations of virtue of the Shravakas, Pratyekabuddhas, and the Mahayana,

original: slob dang mi slob sems kyis grogs su gang gyur pa //
analyzed: slob dang mi slob sems kyis grogs su gang gyur pa //
translated: The merit of the training and beyond training, and whatever else there is,

original: 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dge la rjes yi rang ;
analyzed: 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dge la rjes yi rang ;
translated: I rejoice in all the virtue of the past, present, and future.

original: / sangs rgyas zhing la bzhugs pa'i ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: / sangs rgyas zhing la bzhugs pa'i ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: The Buddhas who dwell in the Buddha-fields, the perfect and complete Buddhas,

original: gdul bya'i snang bar rab tu tshim mdzad khro dang zhi //
analyzed: gdul bya'i snang bar rab tu tshim mdzad khro dang zhi //
translated: The peaceful and wrathful ones who satisfy the vision of those to be trained,

original: 'gro ba mig ldongs shes rab sman gyis gsol ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'gro ba mig ldongs shes rab sman gyis gsol ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to heal the blind eyes of beings with the medicine of wisdom,

original: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bskor bar bskul //
analyzed: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bskor bar bskul //
translated: I request you to turn the wheel of the Dharma, the eighty-four thousand bundles of Dharma.

original: rgyal ba bcom ldan mya ngan 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams //
analyzed: rgyal ba bcom ldan mya ngan 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams //
translated: The Victorious Ones, the Transcendent Conquerors, who wish to pass into nirvana,

original: khyod mi bzhugs na 'jig rten 'di dag mgon med pas //
analyzed: khyod mi bzhugs na 'jig rten 'di dag mgon med pas //
translated: If you do not remain, these worlds will be without a protector.

original: nam mkhas gar khyab sems can ji srid mchis pa ru //
analyzed: nam mkhas gar khyab sems can ji srid mchis pa ru //
translated: As far as space pervades, and as long as there are sentient beings,

original: de srid rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa bzhugs su gsol //
analyzed: de srid rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa bzhugs su gsol //
translated: I request the Victorious Ones and their Bodhisattva heirs to remain.

original: bdag gi lus ngag yid kyi dge ba'i tshogs ji snyed //
analyzed: bdag gi lus ngag yid kyi dge ba'i tshogs ji snyed //
translated: Whatever accumulations of virtue I have with body, speech, and mind,

original: sbyin dang tshul khrims bsgoms pa nyid du ngas bsdus te //
analyzed: sbyin dang tshul khrims bsgoms pa nyid du ngas bsdus te //
translated: Collected through generosity, discipline, and meditation,

original: bdag gir bzung ba med cing sems can kun don du //
analyzed: bdag gir bzung ba med cing sems can kun don du //
translated: Without grasping at them as my own, for the sake of all sentient beings,

original: dmigs pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo bar bgyi //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo bar bgyi //
translated: I dedicate them with a mind free of reference points.

original: bdag gis rje btsun rnams la shin tu dad sems kyis //
analyzed: bdag gis rje btsun rnams la shin tu dad sems kyis //
translated: With a mind of utmost faith in the venerable ones,

original: sems can kun la phan phyir bsod nams ye shes tshogs //
analyzed: sems can kun la phan phyir bsod nams ye shes tshogs //
translated: For the benefit of all sentient beings, the accumulations of merit and wisdom,

original: 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gsum du bsdus byas te //
analyzed: 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gsum du bsdus byas te //
translated: Collected in the three times, past, future, and present,üîΩMay I go to the feet of the glorious supreme venerable guru.

original: dpal ldan bla ma rje btsun mchog gi zhabs drung shog / nyon mongs tshogs rnams dag cing sems rtogs nas //
analyzed: dpal ldan bla ma rje btsun mchog gi zhabs drung shog / nyon mongs tshogs rnams dag cing sems rtogs nas //
translated: Having purified the afflictions and realized the mind,

original: rgyal ba mgon po bcom ldan 'das kyi skur gyur shog / me tog shu kra len cing spros pa nyid spangs te //
analyzed: rgyal ba mgon po bcom ldan 'das kyi skur gyur shog / me tog shu kra len cing spros pa nyid spangs te //
translated: May I attain the form of the Victorious Protector, the BhagavƒÅn.üîΩWithout taking birth in the womb of afflictions, may I take birth in bliss.

original: nyon mongs mngal du mi 'jug bde ba len par shog / yid ches sems kyis lhan cig skyes pa rnyed gyur te //
analyzed: nyon mongs mngal du mi 'jug bde ba len par shog / yid ches sems kyis lhan cig skyes pa rnyed gyur te //
translated: With a mind of trust, may I attain the co-emergent

original: 'byor pa'i nus pas rdo rje lta bu'i lus thob shog / chos rnams ro gcig bsam mi khyab kyi ro thob nas //
analyzed: 'byor pa'i nus pas rdo rje lta bu'i lus thob shog / chos rnams ro gcig bsam mi khyab kyi ro thob nas //
translated: Having attained the taste of the single taste of phenomena,üîΩmay they tame sentient beings through the conduct of awareness and accumulation.

original: rig dang tshogs kyi spyod pas sems can 'dul gyur cig / zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i phrin las nyer thob ste //
analyzed: rig dang tshogs kyi spyod pas sems can 'dul gyur cig / zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i phrin las nyer thob ste //
translated: Having attained the activities of pacifying, increasing, controlling, and wrathful,üîΩmay the wicked ones be brought to Yamantaka.

original: gdug pa can rnams gshin rje gshed la mngon gzhol shog / thun mong dngos grub thogs pa med par thob nas kyang //
analyzed: gdug pa can rnams gshin rje gshed la mngon gzhol shog / thun mong dngos grub thogs pa med par thob nas kyang //
translated: Having attained the common siddhis without obstruction,üîΩmay the yogis of lesser mental strength be sustained by this.

original: blo stobs dman pa'i rnal 'byor de nyid kyis 'tsho shog / nam mkha' dang mtshungs bde ba chen po'i sa thob nas //
analyzed: blo stobs dman pa'i rnal 'byor de nyid kyis 'tsho shog / nam mkha' dang mtshungs bde ba chen po'i sa thob nas //
translated: Having attained the stage of great bliss equal to space,üîΩmay I and sentient beings accomplish Yamantaka.

original: bdag dang sems can gshin rje gshed po nyid grub shog / sgrub po dad @72a * //
analyzed: bdag dang sems can gshin rje gshed po nyid grub shog / sgrub po dad @72a * //
translated: For the practitioner who has faith

original: ldan lus ngag yid gsum rab sbyang phyir //
analyzed: ldan lus ngag yid gsum rab sbyang phyir //
translated: in order to thoroughly purify body, speech, and mind,

original: rje btsun pa rnams mchod pa'i cho ga 'di byas pas //
analyzed: rje btsun pa rnams mchod pa'i cho ga 'di byas pas //
translated: by performing this offering ritual to the venerable ones,

original: nyon mongs sgrib dang shes bya'i sgrib pa byang gyur te //
analyzed: nyon mongs sgrib dang shes bya'i sgrib pa byang gyur te //
translated: may the afflictive obscurations and the obscurations to knowing be purified.

original: rgyun chad med dang phun sum tshogs sku thob par shog /'gro ba thibs po nyon mongs lam la rab tu gzhol //
analyzed: rgyun chad med dang phun sum tshogs sku thob par shog /'gro ba thibs po nyon mongs lam la rab tu gzhol //
translated: Beings are deeply engaged in the path of afflictions,

original: sdig pa'i dba' klong 'khrug pa'i nang du rtag tu zhugs //
analyzed: sdig pa'i dba' klong 'khrug pa'i nang du rtag tu zhugs //
translated: Constantly immersed in the churning waves of evil.

original: rnam smin chu srin gdug pa can gyi khar zhugs nas //
analyzed: rnam smin chu srin gdug pa can gyi khar zhugs nas //
translated: Having entered the jaws of the poisonous sea monster of karmic ripening,

original: g-yeng bas ngal ba don med ma byed dge ba sbyongs //
analyzed: g-yeng bas ngal ba don med ma byed dge ba sbyongs //
translated: Do not engage in meaningless distractions and fatigue, but cultivate virtue.

original: rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Stages of the Ritual of Worship of the Venerable Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ YamƒÅri

original: slob dpon chen po krishna pandi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon chen po krishna pandi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: Composed by the Great Master K·πõ·π£·πáapa·πá·∏çita is completed.
